simple.escp.util

Class EscpUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • simple.escp.util.EscpUtil

  • public class EscpUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a helper class to generate ESC/P string from number that represent ASCII code.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  EscpUtil.CHARACTER_PITCH
      This enum represents available character pitchs.
      static class  EscpUtil.TYPEFACE
      This enum represents available typeface.

    • Method Detail

      • esc

        public static java.lang.String esc(int command,
                   int... value)
        Create an ESC/P code.
        Parameters:
        command - an ASCII number that represent ESC/P command.
        value - an ASCII number value as parameters for specified command.
        Returns:
        ESC/P in form of a string.

      • esc

        public static java.lang.String esc(int command)
        Create an ESC/P code.
        Parameters:
        command - an ASCII number that represent ESC/P command.
        Returns:
        ESC/P in form of a string.

      • escInitalize

        public static java.lang.String escInitalize()
        Generate ESC @ command. Use this command to initialized printer.
        Returns:
        string of ESC @ command.

      • escOnePerSixInchLineSpacing

        public static java.lang.String escOnePerSixInchLineSpacing()
        Generate ESC 2 to select 1/6-inch line spacing.
        Returns:
        string of ESC 2 command.

      • escOnePerEightInchLineSpacing

        public static java.lang.String escOnePerEightInchLineSpacing()
        Generate ESC 0 to select 1/8-inch line spacing.
        Returns:
        string of ESC 0 command.

      • escMasterSelect

        public static java.lang.String escMasterSelect(EscpUtil.CHARACTER_PITCH characterPitch)
        Generate ESC ! for master select.
        Parameters:
        characterPitch - parameter for ESC !
        Returns:
        string of ESC ! command.

      • escPageLength

        public static java.lang.String escPageLength(int value)
        Generate ESC C for setting page length.

        Note that some printer drivers will ignore this value and use the page length setting stored in printer's ROM. For example, in Epson LX-310, you can change page length by pressing LF/FF and Load/Eject button in the same time.

        Parameters:
        value - number of lines in 1 to 127 lines.
        Returns:
        string of ESC C command.

      • escLeftMargin

        public static java.lang.String escLeftMargin(int value)
        Generate ESC l for setting left margin.
        Parameters:
        value - number of characters in 1 to 255 character per line.
        Returns:
        string of ESC l command.

      • escRightMargin

        public static java.lang.String escRightMargin(int value)
        Generate ESC Q for setting right margin.
        Parameters:
        value - number of characters in 1 to 255 character per line.
        Returns:
        string of ESC Q command.

      • escBottomMargin

        public static java.lang.String escBottomMargin(int value)
        Generate ESC N for setting bottom margin.
        Parameters:
        value - number of lines from top-of-form position. Valid values is in range of 1 to 127 lines.
        Returns:
        string of ESC N command.

      • escSelectTypeface

        public static java.lang.String escSelectTypeface(EscpUtil.TYPEFACE typeface)
        Generate ESC k for select typeface.
        Parameters:
        typeface - a typeface to select.
        Returns:
        string of ESC k command.
